page.title: 09David the milkman
page.content:
people go to outlying shopping centres -- Belper, Ashbourne or Mickleover. The mobile library calls at both villages each week, so that library books are easily obtainable.
David the milkman
David is a very important link for our villages, as he brings things that cannot be bought at the Post Office. He is especially useful for people who do not have a car, as the nearest shops are at Brailsford or Hulland Ward. He has been delivering milk in this area for 18 years. He delivers approximately 440 bottles of milk each day, to 300 houses. He travels 50 miles each day, delivering to Allestree, Quarndon, Kedleston, Weston Underwood, Mugginton, Mercaston and Turnditch. He comes on Tuesday,
